overview: at the age of 6 my mum left for LA. if the money was there i would visit her every summer. there was nothing worse than the feeling of getting on that 12 hour flight by myself, confronted with all my abandonment issues and feeling really alone. this film is about how hard it can be to say goodbye how being alone is being all one and how i love you i love me loves important 123 with my dad in mind and in memory of barry kamen
title: Unaccompanied Minor
